title: Yahoo’s Ugly Death, Part 1
description: When Marissa Mayer joined Yahoo as CEO, the company's stock rose 2% the day of the announcement. But the new CEO was basically initiated into her job by a major data breath - and the worst was yet to come.
content:encoded: When Marissa Mayer joined Yahoo as CEO, the company’s stock rose 2% the day of the announcement. But the new CEO was basically initiated into her job by a major data breach – and the worst was yet to come.
